J ames Buckhouse has exhibited in museums and galleries around the world including the Solomon R. Guggenheim’s Works & Process Series, the Whitney Biennial at the Whitney Museum of American Art, The Institute of Contemporary Art in London, The Berkeley Art Museum, and the Dia Center.

Driven to blend the visual and performing arts, he has collaborated with New York City Ballet, San Francisco Ballet, Oregon Ballet Theatre, and Pennsylvania Ballet.

His novel, All Fashion is Fiction: the Complete Writings of Serg Riva, recieved a “genius” review in the NY Times (were they just playing along?) and is available on Amazon.

He regularly lectures on art and culture including the University of California Berkeley, Stanford University, Harvard University, Parsons, and New York University.
- 2016 -
